outline:
1. cord, line, measuring-line
    1. cord
    2. measuring-line
  2. (BDB) onomatapoetic mimicry of Isaiah's words, perhaps senseless
kjv_def: line. Compare H6978 (קַו־קַו)lemma קַו־קַי yod, corrected to קַו־קַו.
strongs_def: a cord (as connecting), especially formeasuring; figuratively, a rule; also a rim, a musical string or accord
